original_text: And when David again inquired of God, God said to him, “You shall not go up after them; go around and come against them opposite the balsam trees.
korean_text: 다윗이 또 하나님께 묻자온대 하나님이 이르시되 마주 올라가지 말고 그들 뒤로 돌아 뽕나무 수풀 맞은편에서 그들을 기습하되

sentences.original_text: And when David again inquired of God,
You shall not go up after them;
and come against them opposite the balsam trees.
